exploreDescription: Explore the exciting world of blockchain ecology through the jump game. Every step could bring surprises, and every jump is a new discovery.
pleaseConnectWallet: Please connect your wallet before starting the game!
dice_button_instruction: Click the 'Roll Dice' button to move using attempts
free_attempts_instruction: One free attempt per day, after using it, you need to buy more using LAT (10 LAT per attempt)
special_tile_instruction: Colored tiles are surprise tiles, may give special rewards
win_instruction: Move along the path and reach the 100th tile to win!
reward_instruction: After winning, go to the rewards center to redeem your rewards
